extension_description.message: Clip web pages to SiYuan in one click

save_path_placeholder.message: Enter a keyword and press Enter to search

tags_placeholder.message: Use commas to separate multiple tags

exp_tips.message: *: Experimental features may be unstable. If clipping has issues, try toggling the relevant option.

exp_list_doc_tree.message: Show the document tree after clipping*

tip_first_time.message: After installing the SiYuan extension for the first time, refresh the page before using it.

tip_token_miss.message: Please configure the API token before clipping content

tip_save_path_miss.message: Please select a save path before clipping content

tip_siyuan_kernel_unavailable.message: Please start SiYuan and ensure network connectivity before trying again.

template_help.message:
Available variables:
${title} - Page title
${url} - Page URL
${siteName} - Site name
${date} - Current date (yyyy-MM-dd)
${time} - Current time (HH:mm)
${tags} - Tags
${excerpt} - Page excerpt
${content} - Page content
